title: How do I get rid of this grey upperhand part
content:
In recent games, the top grey notification stuff doesn't go away and I can't even get rid of it no matter what I do. Which makes it really hard to see how much money I have in these app games- stuff they usually put on the top. 

I keep seeing the solution be "contact your app's developer" but I really don't see why that'd be the solution here? The grey bar only appears sometimes and it's on apps that are native to landscape mode. I think it's a bug because of the recent model updates but I dunno. 

Is there some kinda setting where I can disable this or something where I can make it at least disappear for a little? Mostly just asking for a solution until this stuff gets patched. 

I use a pixel 2.
